18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. üéØ Executive Summary

This report provides a detailed overview of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, a compact SUV known for its robust features and performance. The analysis covers engine specifications, dimensions, comfort and convenience features, and safety aspects, compiled from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive understanding of the vehicle.

üîç Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO comes with both Petrol and Diesel engine options:

  • Petrol Engine: 1197 cc, mStallion (TGDi) engine, Max Power: 128.73bhp@5000rpm, Max Torque: 230Nm@1500-3750rpm, 3 Cylinders
  • Diesel Engine: 1498 cc, Max Power: 115.05 kW @3750rpm, Max Torque: 300Nm@1500-2500rpm

It is available with both Manual and Automatic transmission options.

üìè Dimensions & Capacity

  • Width: 1821 mm

üõ°Ô∏è Safety Features

‚õΩ Fuel & Performance

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 Litres
  • Emission Norm Compliance: BS VI 2.0

üõ†Ô∏è Suspension, Steering & Brakes

  • Front Suspension: MacPherson Strut suspension
  • Rear Suspension: Rear twist beam

  • Rear Brake Type: Disc

The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV.
